short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortless Open Graph tags testing by hosting your meta tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension puts you in control with a one-click solution that makes previewing your content on social networks a breeze.

How to use :
- Install the extension.
- Go to your local site where og tags ready.
- Click the extension icon , after a few seconds it will open a new tab with a link.
- Local images won't share directly, upload the images in postimages or imgbb first. Use that url in the og image tags on your website. Then create a new sharer link using this extension again!

Key Features
1️⃣ Effortless Testing: No need for ngrok tunnels or public URLs. Simply click the extension icon to instantly test your OG tags on localhost.

2️⃣ Instant Previews: See how your content will look on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and more, ensuring perfect previews every time.

3️⃣ Developer-Friendly: Designed with developers in mind, this extension seamlessly integrates into your workflow.

How It Works :
The extension will get all the meta tags from your site and host in a different url so you don't have to deploy and check everytime you make a change!

Boom! Your OG tags are instantly tested and previewed on social networks.
Take control of your social sharing experience and make sure your content shines on every platform. ✨
